decks.notes: This UR Aggro deck focuses on utilizing cheap, aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage to deal damage quickly to the opponent. It also includes spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to control the board and remove blockers. With cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Emberheart Challenger, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while also generating card advantage. The mana base is designed to consistently cast low-cost spells and creatures, with the potential for explosive starts and finishing the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on applying early pressure with cheap creatures like Novice Inspector and Ornithopter, backed up by disruptive cards such as Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Portable Hole. The deck aims to curve out smoothly with its mana base, utilizing cards like Warden of the Inner Sky and Knight-Errant of Eos to maintain a constant stream of threats. By combining aggressive creatures with disruptive elements, the deck seeks to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive tactics using cheap and efficient creatures like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear, backed up by burn spells like Fiery Impulse. The deck utilizes a combination of spells and creatures to apply constant pressure and control the board, while also having the flexibility to bounce threats with cards like Boomerang Basics. Its goal is to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total and finish them off before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly apply pressure to the opponent by playing low-cost aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Emberheart Challenger. The deck also includes a mix of burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to remove blockers and clear the way for attacking creatures. Academic Dispute and Boomerang Basics provide additional removal options, while cards like Heroes' Hangout and Experimental Synthesizer help generate card advantage. The deck aims to proactively control the board and deal damage efficiently to win the game.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize green devotion synergy to ramp up mana quickly and play powerful threats like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll. The deck focuses on aggressive plays with cards like Storm the Festival to find more creatures and Boseiju, Who Endures to protect important spells. The inclusion of Oath of Nissa helps with consistency and Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner provides card draw and mana acceleration. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its aggressive creatures and efficient mana ramp.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on early mana ramp with Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, allowing for quick deployment of powerful creatures like Archon of Emeria and Skyclave Apparition. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben disrupts opponents' spells, while Collected Company provides additional creature advantage. The deck also includes cards like Aven Interrupter and Elspeth, Storm Slayer for added aggression. With a strong mana base and a mix of efficient threats, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive game plan.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on deploying low-cost creatures quickly and efficiently to pressure opponents early on. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria to slow down opponents' plays. The key strategy is to overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive board presence while utilizing cards like Collected Company and Skyclave Apparition for additional value and removal options. The deck aims to maintain tempo and aggression throughout the game to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board through fast and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, while utilizing burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to clear the way for attacks. The deck also focuses on generating value through card draw with spells like Academic Dispute and Consider, and can disrupt opponents with bounce effects like Boomerang Basics and Brazen Borrower. By applying constant pressure and maintaining card advantage, this UR Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to play aggressively with low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Key cards include Soul-Scar Mage, Emberheart Challenger, and Monastery Swiftspear for early pressure, supported by efficient removal spells like Reckless Rage and Burst Lightning. The deck aims to maintain tempo and control the board, using cards like Academic Dispute and Boomerang Basics to disrupt opponent's strategy. Monstrous Rage and Stock Up provide additional damage and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent until victory is achieved.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to aggressively play creatures on the board, utilizing mana dorks and efficient beaters to overwhelm the opponent. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben disrupts noncreature spells, while Aven Interrupter and Archon of Emeria provide flying threats. Skyclave Apparition and Enduring Innocence offer removal options, and Collected Company enables explosive creature plays. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and creature synergy, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out the game quickly.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent's game plan, while also deploying threats like Skyclave Apparition and Voice of Resurgence to apply pressure, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes mana ramp with Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to ensure a smooth curve and consistent aggression.

This deck focuses on quickly getting creatures on the battlefield and dealing damage as fast as possible. It utilizes cheap spells and creatures with prowess abilities to make them bigger and more threatening. By controlling the board with removal spells and bouncing spells, it aims to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total and emerge victorious before the opponent can stabilize. The key strategy is to maintain a fast pace and apply constant pressure to overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent by utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, along with efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Torch the Tower, the goal is to chip away at the opponent's life total before they can stabilize. The deck also includes card draw spells like Academic Dispute and Stormchaser's Talent to maintain hand advantage and apply pressure. Additionally, the deck has some tempo-focused cards like Boomerang Basics and Riverpyre Verge to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence of efficient creatures and disrupting opponents with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. Using Collected Company to bring out multiple threats at once, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with constant pressure. The inclusion of cards like Skyclave Apparition and Elspeth, Storm Slayer provide removal options while maintaining a strong aggressive strategy. The deck also includes mana ramp with Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to help cast its powerful spells ahead of curve.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to aggressively build a board presence using low-cost creatures like Elvish Mystic, Badgermole Cub, and Llanowar Elves while disrupting your opponent's game plan with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben. Collected Company allows for explosive creature plays, while cards like Tyvar, the Pummeler and Elspeth, Storm Slayer provide additional power and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed, disruption, and powerful threats to secure victory in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures while disrupting their game plan with spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent by playing aggressively and utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage to deal damage quickly. The inclusion of cards like Academic Dispute and Heroes' Hangout also provides additional ways to gain advantage and control the battlefield. Additionally, the deck utilizes lands like Steam Vents and Riverpyre Verge for consistent mana production.
